attributes.action: Get Boris Johnson To Resign As Prime Minister!
attributes.additional_details: Boris Johnson Has Been Hosting Lockdown Parties And Gathering’s While People Were Sacrificing Themselves To Stop The Spread Of The Virus, Dying Alone Without Any Family Members And Children Were Losing Out On Their Education. While Cases Were Rising In November/December 2020, Boris Johnson Was Hosting Parties At 10 Downing Street, The Leader Is Under A Police Investigation And The Sue Gray Report Isn’t The Full Report. It Is A “Failure Of Leadership And Judgement” And Boris Should Resign ASAP!
attributes.background: The Public Want The Conservative Party To Overthrow Boris Johnson As Prime Minister Of England/UK Because Of The Controversy Surrounding Him.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You might also like to sign this petition:

'Require any MP or Peer convicted of a criminal offence be removed from office': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600515
